info.board:
HalfBoard (HB) - buffet breakfast and dinner. Supplementary drinks for dinner.

All Inclusive (AI) - breakfast, lunch, dinner buffet, between meals / afternoon / during the day snacks, coffee, tea, cake, ice cream / ice cream for children. Local soft and alcoholic drinks available during the hours indicated by the hotel.
info.rooms:
Standard room

• balcony / terrace

• air conditioning

• TV-SAT, safe (payable), mini bar / fridge, tea and coffee making facilities

• Wi-Fi internet (payable)

• bathroom (bath / shower, toilet, hair dryer)

• Telephone

• Sea view rooms at an additional cost

Family Room

• about 30m2

• equipment similar to standard room

info.board:
Bed & Breakfast (BB) - buffet breakfast.

HalfBoard (HB) - buffet breakfast and dinner. Supplementary drinks for dinner.

Full Board (FB) - breakfast, lunch, dinner buffet. Drinks with lunch and dinner payable.

All Inclusive (AI) - breakfast, lunch, dinner buffet, between meals / afternoon / during the day snacks, coffee, tea, cake, ice cream / ice cream for children. Local soft and alcoholic drinks available during the hours indicated by the hotel.

info.board:
• restaurants, a la carte restaurants (5), bars (17), a pastry shop

Ultra All Inclusive

(24h)

• breakfast (07: 00-10: 00), late breakfast (10: 00-11: 00), lunch (12: 30-14: 30), dinner (19: 00-21: 30), late meal (21 : 30-00: 00), late meal (00: 00-07: 00)

A la carte restaurants

info.rooms:
• standard rooms for max. 3 people: 1 bedroom, individual air conditioning, safe (free), coffee / tea set (free), minibar (free, replenished daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (bath or shower, toilet), balcony

• deluxe garden / sea view rooms for max. 3 people: 1 bedroom, central air conditioning, safe (free), coffee / tea set (free), minibar (free, refilled daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (shower, toilet), balcony

• deluxe sea / garden view family rooms for max. 4 people: 2 bedrooms, connecting door between rooms, central air conditioning, safe (free), coffee / tea set (free), minibar (free, refilled daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (shower, toilet), balcony

• lake house pool view rooms for max. 2 people: 1 bedroom, access to a shared swimming pool, individual air conditioning, safe (free), coffee / tea set (free), minibar (free, replenished daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (bath or shower, toilet) , balcony

• lake house pool view rooms with 2 bedrooms for max. 4 people: 2 bedrooms, connecting door between the rooms, access to a shared pool, individual air conditioning, safe (free), tea / coffee making facilities (free), minibar (free, refilled daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (bathtub or shower, toilet), balcony

• lake house swim up rooms for max. 2 people: 1 bedroom, access to a shared swimming pool, individual air conditioning, safe (free), coffee / tea set (free), minibar (free, replenished daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (bath or shower, toilet) , Terrace

• lake house swim up rooms with 2 bedrooms for max. 4 people: 2 bedrooms, connecting door between the rooms, access to a shared pool, individual air conditioning, safe (free), tea / coffee making facilities (free), minibar (free, refilled daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (bathtub or shower, toilet), terrace

• lake house swim up rooms for max. 5 people: living room, 2 bedrooms, connecting door between rooms, access to a shared swimming pool, individual air conditioning, safe (free), coffee / tea set (free), minibar (free, refilled daily), TV, telephone, bathroom (shower, toilet), terrace

info.board:
All inclusive: breakfast, lunch and dinner buffet. Light snacks throughout the day. Local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks are served from 10:00 to 00:00 in selected bars. All Inclusive is valid until 18.00 on the day of departure.

Ultra All Inclusive / All Inclusive Plus (UAI / AI +) - breakfast, late breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks in between meals, night meal. Local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks are served from 10:00 to 00:00 in selected bars. All Inclusive is valid until 18.00 on the day of departure.
info.rooms:
Standard Room

• individually controlled air-conditioning

• bathroom (toilet, shower / bath, hair dryer)

• TV-Sat, telephone

• mini-bar (payable)

• safe, Wi-Fi internet (free)

• balcony / terrace

Family Room

• two-room apartment with a separate bedroom

• family rooms are in a side building

One-storey villa

• situated in the building by the pool

• a living room with a bedroom or a separate bedroom

• area of ​​approx. 35 m2

Duplex villa

• situated in the building by the pool

• living room + sleeping area on the 1st floor, bedroom on the 2nd floor, 2 bathrooms

• area approx. 57 m2
